mapper.select: select shop_seq, shop_name, shop_register, shop_code, shop_address, shop_phone, shop_intro, shop_image, shop_start, shop_end, shop_off from T_HAIRSHOP
mapper.update: update T_HAIRSHOP set shop_off=#{shop_off}, shop_address=#{shop_address}, shop_phone=#{shop_phone}, shop_start=#{shop_start}, shop_end=#{shop_end}, shop_image=#{shop_image}, shop_intro=#{shop_intro} where shop_seq=#{shop_seq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_HAIRSHOP (shop_name, shop_register, shop_code, shop_address, shop_phone, shop_intro, shop_image, shop_start, shop_end, shop_off) VALUES (#{shop_name},#{shop_register},#{shop_code},#{shop_address},#{shop_phone},#{shop_intro},#{shop_image},#{shop_start},#{shop_end}, shop_off)
